title: Skydogenet
author: Skydogenet
created_time: October 20, 2022, 07:43:06 AMLast edit: October 22, 2023, 11:07:28 AM by Skydogenet
content: ▄                 ▄          ▐▒▀▄▄▄▄▀▒▌       ▄▀▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▓▀▄    ▄▀░█░░░░█░░▒▒▒▐    ▌░░░░░░░░░░░▒▒▐   ▐▒░██▒▒░░░░░░░▒▐   ▐▒░▓▓▒▒▒░░░░░░▄▀    ▀▄░▀▀▀▀░░░░▄▀        ▀▀▄▄▄▄▄▀▀     SKYDOGENETMuch Bitcoin - Such Doge - Very RememberSKYDOGENET - Drivechain fork (bitcoin core + BIPs 300 and 301) - Welcome to POW...Skydogenet is the swiss army knife of decentralized crypto currencies networks using POW.It's layer 1 is similar to Bitcoin and Drivechain is implemented on it.This enable the use on layer 2 of trustless two way peg sidechains.The technologies advancement of Skydogenet are made possible using Drivechain (BIP-300 and BIP-301)Network specifications:-Total supply: 210 billion-Algorithm: Skydoge-Subsidy halving interval: 2100000 blocks (each 4 years), 4 times-Block time: 1 minute-Difficulty adjustment: 1 minute-Block initial reward: 50 000 SKYDOGE-Maturity: 100 confirmationsDrivechain current sidechains that could be implemented and activated in Skydogenet:-Zside (Zcash sidechain)-Ethside (Ethereum sidechain)-Bitassets (NFT sidechain)-Thunder (big blocks sidechain / scaling solution)Exchange: XEGGEX: https://xeggex.com/?ref=6493118b0f092a8199a0eba9Block explorer: http://explorer.skydogepool.xyz/Pools: https://miningpoolstats.stream/skydogeTwitter: https://twitter.com/skydogenetTelegram: https://t.me/+1TWyXRaC7iczZTllDiscord: https://discord.gg/GKHGDGbt8SIRC treenode.net #skydogenetThe use of a VPN is highly recommended.Github: https://github.com/skydogenetHelp fund SKYDOGENET development by donating SKYDOGE to 1FtCywQwhP4nqKjxRaoLYrJr88kbcMSHu2     ██▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄       ▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▓██     ▀▀▒▒▒▀▀▒▒▒▓▓▓▓█  ▄▄▄▒▒░    ░░▒▒▒▓█  ▀▀▀▒▄▄▄   ░░▒▒▒▓█    █▄░   ░░▒▒▒▒▓▓█     ▀█▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▀
